text: Olivier Assayas (born 25 January 1955) is a French movie director, screenwriter, and movie critic. He made his debut in 1986, after directing some short movies and writing for the influential movie magazine Cahiers du cin√©ma. Assayas's movie Cold Water was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 1994 Cannes Film Festival. ==References== ==Other websites== * New York Times article on Assayas * Bringing Down the House: A Conversation with Olivier Assayas, The Notebook, mubi.com Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie critics Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Writers from Paris
title: Olivier Assayas
